The only issue is the emulator, sometimes for boss fights and such the framerates don't work right with fast-forward or the emulator. Simply download PSXeven, and play through that fight, you can google how to set it up, simply set frame rate limit equal to 70 and you are golden. Same frame rate issue when coming out of Dragoon mode as well. +1
